ygData.subject: Re: In Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree I want my pointed hat or at the very least make a circlet look like a circlet. I am a Mage if you are not going to let me wear armor dont make my stuff
ygData.messageBody:
I agree I want my pointed hat or at the very least make a circlet look like
a circlet. I am a Mage if you are not going to let me wear armor dont make
my stuff look like armor.

Ok now that I have ranted here is somemore stuff on unrest
The BK (barkeep) drops the thik leather apron. He is on the second floor
right below the Knight that drops the Bloodstained Mantle and Tunic.

BTW for those of you who are new to Unrest. If all the rooms in the house
are not camped you will end up pulling the empty rooms to you if you hunt
in the house.

Feather Dreamwalker
Guild Master of "Guardians of Lore"
Rathe Server

At 06:20 PM 9/8/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: MFerrulo@...
>
>
>Well I'm heading to Permafrost as soon as get my next level (currently
23rd).
> I will be seeking the Runed Circlet - a pretty nice head item for Wizards
>(rediculous that Verant made yet another Magic user specific head item look
>like armor - I want my Pointy hat!!!!!). Perma has two very distinct
areas -
>the beginning part that lvls 15 to 30 can do well in and then the harder
part
>filled with Timber Wolves and Ice Giants.
>
>Wizaro Wrathcaster
>Solusek Ro
